content: I had a problem installing the app on another device and the developer of the app replied to my question within a few minutes. The app does exactly what it is suppose to do and has direct access to my Google Photos Albums so that the process of creating a slideshow takes less then a minute.
excellent

Brilliant app. Does exactly as described. Brilliant and minimalistic interface, easy to use. Just emailed the developer a question and got a reply within 15 mins which answered my question. Absolutely amazing all around. Would definitely recommend. Cheers.

if you're using a chromecast, do not buy this app. IF it actually works, there's no transition between shots, just a hard frame change and the app developer said they can't fix this. The random setting is garbage, you have to go back and forth a few times to make it work and eventually it seems to go back in order. Then there's the fact that it just doesn't work sometimes. If you made the mistake of buying this already, you can mirror your screen and get some use out of it
replyContent: While it is true that slide animations do not display on the Chromecast, they will display if you cast your display. Also if you have the new Google TV Chromecast, you can run the app directly on the chromecast and will see slide transitions in the app. As for random not working, please contact me so I can get to the bottom of your issue. Thanks.

content: Works great. Nice way to turn an old tablet into a digital photo frame.

I am reluctant to buy an app without trying a free version before, but in this ocasion I took the chance and it really worth it. I was looking for a replacement for Google Photos, and this one met all my requirements. I haven't tried yet using it with Chromecast, but so far it works great and could only be an added value. Thanks and congratulations!

Really good app with good Google Photos support. While using Chromecast to view slideshows, please either don't blank the screen between photos or implement the selected animation effect from settings. The current transition is jarring and makes viewing slideshows on my tv unpleasant.
Really enjoy the app as I use a tablet as a digital photo frame, however getting a constant message saying used daily quota? Is there a way to stop this?
replyContent: This should no longer be happening.  If you experience any further issues, please email me at snapwood@snapwoodapps.com.  Thanks!

content: Best app for Google photos. This is the secret to casting Google photos glitch free to a Chromecast supported device.
Very good'''
Slideshow blacks out for a few seconds. interrupting the Slideshow ðŸ˜¡

I'm using a tablet as digital photo frame. After a long research, it is currently the ONLY app I've found capable of doing three tasks: displaying videos within the photo slideshow DIRECTLY from a free unlimited cloud storage platform AND autostart slideshow when the app starts. Super fast reply from developer. Minor issue adjusted in record time.
So much better than using Google Photos. Let's you sort your albums and photos as you wish.

So far, I've organized photos from my phone into albums wit Google photos, then cast them to TV us using pfolio app on firestick. I got a message ab storage upon opening pfolio. I followed the instructions but not sure what app I need to correct. I'm wondering is it Google fotos, my phone or pfolio? I need more time to do a full review. Pfolio is a real service for my firesticks and hope I can organize all with these apps. Nothing else I've used so far does it so well.
Very happy with it, does what it says. If possible would like a rotate 90 degree option please.
I forgot to say that from last app update everything works perfect. No more issues with playing video files from google photos. Now this app, and his creator (or team) deserve 5 stars ;)
replyContent: Marko, please write to me at snapwood@snapwoodapps.com so I can help you.  Thanks!

content: Ideal to sync with Android app and watching your favourite photos on the big screen
I used to be able to use this for offline access, but that doesn't work anymore, even with the download option
The mp4 video i pre- created from my google photos never uploaded to IG or FB. Only the photo of video! ðŸ˜•
great to have all your photos in one easily accessible place
only app i found that can do a slideshow on google photo album and display the photo caption.

I have used this app for several years to be able to view Google Photos when I am offline. The new version does not seem to have the capability anymore. It won't automatically download, and even if I manually "Export to Device Gallery" for each album, the photos would only be saved in the internal memory rather than on the SD card regardless how I set the "Download Location".
seemed ok but hardly a viable replacement for photos...refunded
replyContent: Paul, please write me at snapwood@snapwoodapps.com and let me know what was missing to make it a replacement for you.  I'm always interested in hearing feedback, good or bad.  Thanks!

content: Great app and a good Google Photos replacement for Android TV! Plus, excellent developer assistance! Good job!!!
best app ive used to show a specific album as my screen savers on the nvidia shied
replyContent: Please write to me at snapwood@snapwoodapps.com.  The app still displays albums as before, but Google took away the auto backup albums with their API change.  You can replace those with your own.  Let me know your usage and I can advise.  Thanks!

content: Good app for Google photos
Been using this app for many years. Always reliable and the developer has been very responsive with any questions I have had.
PRETTY DARN GOOD!!
Signing in with my Google account wouldn't work. That's pretty much a show stopper with this app.
When casting a slideshow the chromecast symbol is displayed on each image like a watermark. Hopeless.
Best way to get a decent slideshow on Android. Even direct from your Google photos albums!
Excellent app, very fast.

I used to love this app, but for some time now I've found it unusable because it shows every day that I take photos and share them as an album with the photo date. I only want it to show (and download) real albums that I created, like it used to. Another app on the play store is able to separate these out as posts. I'm not prepared to go into the display settings every day and hide albums of all the photos I took and shared that day. I'd rather just use Google Photos itself and wait until I have WiFi. Disappointing.
Nice app, works great on nVidia shield to view slideshows. I wish there was a way to have a Google music Playlist or Radio station play while the slideshow is on.

I have a question.   Once my photos are uploaded to Google Photos, can I remove them from my camera?   I am going out of the country for 2 weeks so would like to upload to Google Photos then delete them from my phone without them deleting on Google Photos
Can't upload video and pic of folders. With one click.

Excellent app to allow for offline viewing. I'm traveling being cell 
coverage, on airplanes, and in secure buildings without cell coverage most 
days so this app has been essential.

I was so frustrated that Google photos has such poor slide show 
functionalities. This app is amazing and is everything that Google should 
have included in it's own photo app. Also if side loaded works great on 
fire TV so it is a great way to get gphotos on an Amazon product. I cannot 
recommend this product enough if you are looking for a good slideshow app!!
replyContent: Thanks! I'm glad you like the app.  The app can be purchased from amazon as well, which would get you continued updates without continued side loading.

content: ARGHH!  It took over my SD card overfilling it leading to crashing my phone hard, (factory reset).  I did not know the cause yet so I let it reinstall.  Had same SD card in phone.  Finally found the problem was in the "SNAPWOOD" folder who makes Pfolio.  Too many files for Uninstall to work.  Developer needs to add a limit to their files expansion.  Liked the functionality very much.
replyContent: Dan, could you write me at snapwoodapps@gmail.com?  I'd like to understand more about your situation.  Thanks.

content: February 2016. I have been using the Picasa version for many years and loved it! After Google killed Picasa and most of the API with it, this is the only access the developers have to Google Photos. It is much less powerful than the old Picasa version (Google's fault) but I still like it better than G Photos for displaying (always filling the full screen regardless of orientation), selective album offline view, auto upload to specific album (i don't like the auto G Photos backup) and other neat features.   Update October 2017.  Still using the app. Finally got a phone with enough storage to sync my entire library. 250 albums with good filtering and search to find anything I need.  Thank you!
We can't tag the pictures at the  same time were rating them !! And should have a 5th star
Priceless if you have Android TV and actually want your photos to show up from your Google albums on the screensaver!

Good app....only thing is when you organize by date, it only goes by single days.  I'd like for either to open entire months (sometimes only one or two pics were taken per day) or when scrolling through pics, move on to the next day instead of starting over the same day, when you get to the days' last image. Same thing for the slideshow function, it can only make a slideshow out of a single day's shots. Unless I'm wrong...am I? Additionally, it doesn't always update.  I Have to dump the cache and downloaded files in order for it to update recent additions to my google photo archive. Also, ( I just lowered the rating to 2 stars)  when I add photos to my google photos, the pfolio app on my TV doesn't update!  I try hitting the reload button, but nothing.  The only thing that works is to go into the app setting and delete files and cache.  Then when I reload the app it loads an updated google photo directory.  BUt I have to re-enter my username and pswd which is a pain.
Turned an old Android tablet into a digital photo frame.  Nice
My child bought this app accidentally  and I have been trying to get my money back but haven't gotten any results.
replyContent: You first contact me 18 hours ago and I refunded it 17 hours ago.  I believe that you have gotten great results.  If not, email me at snapwoodapps@gmail.com.  Thanks!

content: Good app but a couple things have me looking for an alternative: 1) A setting to disable the wake lock during slideshow mode. I want to be able to control the screen turning on/off myself with Tasker. 2) An option to have videos downloaded and auto-started during a slideshow.
Great
I prefer this to G photos as I can update and view albums, view high definition pics as uploaded etc. As long as this app is supported, I will continue to use it.
Wow. I love it. All my 30,000+ pics at my fingertips and quickly too
Keeps things stored on time
Awesome
Good app, does what I wanted. Very responsive developer fixed an issue for me very quickly.

I could not get it to go full screen so complained to the dev and it seems that it was a problem between the tablet and the chair. I would still like it to show the downloaded pics but it's working for me.
Exactly what I was looking for
AndroidTV support lacks too many features, e.g. zooming. And a lot of options could be assigned to specific buttons, but the app does not use this potential.

I love this app!! The album caching works very good. Set it and forget it. Surprised this doesn't have more downloads. There is room for small improvements, but this app is loaded with powerful features. Very fast, love that I can cache to external SD card. Love the last update with new sorting options. Thank you!!

Does what it claims,  and does it very efficiently. Reliable caching to ext SD card. User has lots of control over what gets uploaded and downloaded, and under what conditions. But all the defaults are sensible, so if you just want to install it and run it, without tinkering, you'll be OK. Developer is VERY responsive: I had a glitch with an update; reported it; Brian responded in less than 24 hours, saying he had just uploaded a new update that fixed the problem. The new update  (2.5.11) is working perfectly.   Please don't be put off by the lack of a trial version: just pay the tiny asking price, install and enjoy.  The time you save can be used to enjoy your photos, or take more.  Samsung SM-T800 on   KitKat 4.4.2 Samsung GT-I9195 on Jelly Bean 4.2.2

The first app I've found that can do daydream for my Nexus Player. Thanks. Would be great if slideshow could use multiple accounts at the same time rather than selecting one at a time. That way we could have a photos for the whole family on the big screen.
Wouldn't play videos from my Google photos
Can't see chromecast icon and can't select sdcard1 for storage location
And customer support is very good too.
I still can't place pictures in my contacts list, unless I downloaded them one at a time

Can sync my photos to SD-Card, amazing fast, simple no confusion, can organize my photos with this app, can filter the albums so no long search anymore!! Waited so long to finally get a super good app like this!
I'm thrilled it's back. Excellent app to create all kinds of album's. Now I can cast  to the tv. Cool is an understatement :)
Better than previous version, with Google+ integration
Very easy to use and you can chose where to store your albums /         sd card.Ext  or sd card.0/ etc,.
...... If not THE best Picasa client currently available :)
Thank you Brian for such excellent support - much appreciated !
Thanks, must have missed that!
replyContent: Please long press on the album and select Share URL... to share a link to the album.  Note that the album has to be public or the user has to be logged in to view albums that are otherwise not public.

content: The only things this app needs is a better way of filtering tags and stars, and a way to open/access multiple Picasa accounts at the same time.
